title: The examination of Captain William Bedlow, deceased, relating to the Popish Plot taken in his last sickness, by Sir Francis North, Chief Justice of the Court of Common Pleas ; together with the narrative of Sir Francis North at the council board, and the letter of Sir Francis North to Mr. Secretary Jenkins relating to this examination.
author: Guilford, Francis North, Baron, 1637-1685.
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb and Henry Hills ...,
